headline: Like Old Times: Anthony Scores, but Loses, at the Garden
abstract: The former Knick had 26 points and 7 rebounds, but his Trail Blazers fell.
lead_paragraph: Before Wednesday nightâ€™s game at Madison Square Garden, Carmelo Anthony found himself glancing up at the rafters. He was wondering whether his No. 7 would be up there someday. The Knicks will ultimately make that decision, he said. But he was hoping to nudge the process along.
